email.title: Merch Collection
email.text:
The long-awaited hoodies, T-shirts and beanies have finally arrived!
If you've ordered one of the above, Fawaz will be in the Huxley level two common room for you to collect your order on the following times:
- Wednesday 13th March - 12pm - 3pm (tomorrow) - Friday 15th March - 12pm - 3pm - Monday 18th March - 4pm - 7pm
Additionally, if you ordered a hoodie and are **graduating this year**, please let us know when you come to collect your order as we have special 'Class of 2019' hoodies available!
If you can't make it for these times, please let us know via email at docsoc@ic.ac.uk and we will try work around your availability.
